name: Amazing Track
description:
Amazing Track is a ZigZag like endless arcade game. Tap the screen to change the movement direction and try to stay on the track as long as you can.

developed for PC/Android/HTML.  The source code is available on GitHub.

SFX: Dustyroom Casual Game Sound (CC0)

Font: Righteous by Astigmatic (OFL)

Code: Eugeny Novikov (MIT)
